recipe.title: Roasted Beet Tzatziki Salad
ingredients: 1/4 cup peeled, seeded, and minced Persian (mini) cucumber
2 radishes, sliced into very thin rounds
1 cup equal parts torn fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves, dill fronds, and mint leaves, plus extra for garnish
1 cup Pickled Beets; reserve a little liquid for garnish
Pinch of ground sumac, for garnish
instructions: Beet Tzatziki: In a medium bowl, combine all the ingredients.
In a medium bowl, combine all the ingredients.

Salad: Spread the tzatziki on two serving plates and top with the eggs. In a medium bowl, combine the tomato, cucumber, chile flakes, radishes, poppy seeds, fresh herbs, and buttermilk. Season with a little sea salt. Broil or sauté the pickled beets to slightly caramelize and blister the outer surface. Top the eggs with the cucumber-tomato salad and the hot beets. Garnish with more herbs, a pinch of sumac, a little olive oil, and the pickling liquid from the beets.
